[StartBattle] 이 스킬로 발동 예정인 경우, 자신의 최대 체력의 <style="highlight">([DevyatDimensionalSackSinclair])</style>% 만큼 보호막을 얻음 (최대 <style="highlight">25</style>%, 턴 당 1회)
context:
EN :
[StartBattle] At 15+ [DevyatDimensionalSackSinclair], activate 'W-wait, I need to do some maintenance...!' instead (once per turn)
[StartBattle] If this Skill is to be activated, gain <style="highlight">([DevyatDimensionalSackSinclair])%</style> of this unit's max HP as Shield (max <style="highlight">25%</style>, once per turn)
JP :
[StartBattle] [DevyatDimensionalSackSinclair]が15以上なら、「ちょ、ちょっと整備してきます…！」として発動(1ターンに1回)
[StartBattle] このスキルで発動予定なら、自分の体力最大値の<style="highlight">([DevyatDimensionalSackSinclair])%</style>だけバリアを得る(最大<style="highlight">25</style>%, 1ターンにつき1回)
